file_content.text: Huh! A Jedi. Never killed one of your kind before.
That reminds me. I should buy some armor.
He sounds pleased. I'm not sure that's good.
T7 = initiating self-repair functions now
This should be interesting.
The way behind me is clear. You're free to go. All I want is that reactor.
Step away from the reactor.
"Free to go"... heh. Good one.
You want to give me all your weapons and abandon this facility.
[Force Persuade] Flee.
You got a strange sense of humor... hey, what are you idiots doing? Get back here!
Stupid Houks! Don't know what you did, but I'm not leaving. White Maw bosses kill deserters.
If by "interesting" you mean "dead", then yes, you should find this very interesting.
No, just short.
I like your skin. I think I'll wear it.
It's nothing personal. We have to kill you. White Maw bosses don't forgive failure. Not in their natures.
They're Gen'Dai. Got no regard for life--not even their own. Course, it's easy for them. They're indestructible.
All living things die.
Nothing is indestructible.
Not Gen'Dai. The bosses can take anything. You'd see for yourself, if you wasn't about to get killed.
I've never heard of your leaders. Introduce me to them.
What is a Gen'Dai?
They wouldn't like that, and neither would you. They can't die--but they enjoy killing even more than me.
Was hoping this wouldn't be a fair fight, but I'll make do....
You got backup. I don't. Means I won't have to go easy on you....
Come on, boys--let's keep the bosses happy....
If your leaders don't fear death, that's because they haven't met me.
I'll deal with them. [Attack.]
How big is your skull? I could use a new drinking cup....
